pageContent: Purpose: The many years most men diagnosed with early prostate cancer live after diagnosis allow evolving assessments of their cancer control and their treatment choices, but little is known of these outcomes or the factors that influence them.

metaData.source:
The association of treatment-related symptoms with quality-of-life outcomes for localized prostate carcinoma patients
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11857323/
